(Uh one slight problem, unless Silverbolt has grown a bit, Blaise is much 
bigger than Silverbolt.  He is slightly shorter than DarkPrime and just as 
wide.  It is a matter of weight ratios.  A several hundred pound Silverbolt 
cannot carry a one ton Blaise.)

::KnokBlaise::
    He was starting to be raised and is moved a few feet when he falls back 
to the ground.  Blaise tips forward and Knok wisely jumps out before Blaise 
comes crushing down.

::Knok::
    He does a nice flip landing on Skar who is now awake.

::Skar::
    Skar throws Knok into Blaise making a small ding in his leg.  Skar runs 
past Knok and quickly digs a hole to get at the control port.  Once again in 
control of Blaise, Skar decides to change the weapon back to two guns.

::SkarBlaise::
    He looks up to where Silverbolt is and fires a pair of rockets while 
firing a set of four blasts at Fury.
